name: reminders-backend
description: Node, Express & Postgres backend for reminders

scripts.backupdb: rm -f links_dump.sql && pg_dump -f links_dump.sql --table public.links reminders
scripts.backupproddb: rm -f links_dump.sql && heroku pg:backups:capture && heroku pg:backups:download && pg_restore latest.dump -f links_dump.sql

author: Fullchee Zhang <fullchee@gmail.com>
